name: Batgirl
description:
The Mayor's Daughter is Missing! The only one who can find her is the one and only Batgirl! Travel through Gotham City as our favorite Gotham Knight and find clues to see who the kidnapper is and where they have the mayor's daughter! Action-packed with lots of fun for all!

Use arrow keys and Z to play

Backpack sprite made by TC 

Sprites made by Wintonson and Beachboogeyman on itch

Music from ModArchive.org

Backgrounds made by myself!
